products.title: Pure Cotton Graphic Sweatshirt
products.description: Add a classic US college look to your casual wardrobe with this pure cotton sweatshirt. Comfy regular fit. Embroidered slogan reads 'Long Valley mountain view', with mountain graphic. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Floral Short Sleeve Midi Shirt Dress
products.description: We've given the classic shirt dress a floral flourish with this statement-making design. It's cut in a regular fit, with a waist-skimming empire line and elegant midi length. The button placket finishes just below the knee, creating a flowing split hem. Short sleeves make it perfect for warmer weather. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Flexifit™ Lounge Hoodie
products.description: Get ready to kick back and relax with this lounge hoodie. Regular fit, with a feminine v-neckline and metal hardware on the drawcord. Flexifit™ four-way stretch ensures perfectly comfortable wear. For a coordinated look, pair with the matching joggers. M&S Collection: versatile styles in modern shapes with unique and playful details.

products.title: Pure Cotton Broderie V-Neck Blouse
products.description: With its breezy fabric and pretty broderie detailing, this Per Una blouse has easy summer days written all over it. The regular style is made from lightweight textured cotton and features pleating at the neckline for an effortless silhouette. Three-quarter length sleeves with elasticated cuffs and broderie frills give a delicate finish. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be. Per Una: stylish designs crafted with carefully considered details and feminine flourishes.

products.title: Printed Collared Long Sleeve Shirt
products.description:
With a lively splash of print, this long-sleeved shirt is full of contemporary appeal. Designed in our comfortable regular fit with a classic collared neck. Made with recycled polyester.

M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

products.title: Easy Iron Linen Striped Shirt
products.description: This striped linen-blend shirt is ideal for summery days. Cut a little narrower across the shoulders and waist in our regular fit. Handy easy-to-iron finish. Our moisture-wicking Cool Comfort technology helps keep you cool all day long. All of the cotton for our clothing is sustainably sourced and always will be.

products.title: Linen Hawaiian Shirt
products.description: This vibrant linen-rich Hawaiian shirt will add a tropical touch to your wardrobe. Collared regular fit design with a classic button-through fastening. Easy-to-iron fabric with a moisture-wicking finish for all-day comfort. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles. Made with sustainably sourced viscose.
